instance_exists: This function can be used in two ways depending on what you wish to check. You can give it an object_index to check for, in which case this function will return <tt>true</tt> if any active instances of the specified object exist in the current room, or you can also supply it with an instance id, in which case this function will return <tt>true</tt> if that specific instance exists and is active in the current room.
Please note that this function does not take into account those instances that have been deactivated using the instance deactivate functions.
